host.label: Management IP address or hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or  hostname of the data source so that IBM Cloud Pak for Security can communicate with it

port.label: Host port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the hostname or IP address

help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the data source setting can be found in the specified link

selfSignedCert.label: PEM Formatted SSL certificate(s)
selfSignedCert.description: Provide a self-signed or CA-signed certificate to securely communication with the data source.

events_mode.label: Include process events?
events_mode.description: When enabled results will include process events. When disabled only process metadata will be included.

token.label: API token
token.description: API token of the data source
